definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: band, army (loan-word, orig. wing of army; As. agappu, Aram. [[אגף]], wing. Others, fr. [[גפף]], Sta:§ 256 b)—All Ez. & all pl. (or du. ?) [[אֲגַפֶּיךָ]] Ez Eze 38:9, Eze 39:4; [[אֲגַפָּיו]] Eze 12:14 + 3 t; [[אֲגַפֶּיהָ]] Eze 38:6 (all c. [[כָּל־]] exc. Eze 38:22)—bands, armies of king of Judah Ez Eze 12:14, Eze 17:21; hordes (RV) of Gog Eze 38:9, Eze 38:22, Eze 39:4; specif. of [[גּׁמֶר]] Eze 38:6; of [[תּוֹגַרְמָה]] ib.
